channel.title: Comments on: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #12

item.title: By: Demetrick Ferguson
item.dc:creator: Demetrick Ferguson
item.description: The social implications are fascinating. Pretty much brought me all-in to this space. I am glad you liked the episode!
item.content:encoded: The social implications are fascinating. Pretty much brought me all-in to this space. I am glad you liked the episode!

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description: Enjoyed your podcast episode! I was reminded of dynamics and discussions with my sister. (Like your brother, I'm older, and she got me into Bitcoin). Once you get beyond the tech talk and consider the social implications... WOW. Fascinating.
item.content:encoded: Enjoyed your podcast episode! I was reminded of dynamics and discussions with my sister. (Like your brother, I’m older, and she got me into Bitcoin). Once you get beyond the tech talk and consider the social implications… WOW. Fascinating.
